name: Space Something - a text based adventure game
name_original: Space Something - a text based adventure game
description:
The greatest space-based text-game this side of 1983. Or perhaps the greatest text-based space-game. In this game — you decide!

"It's really hard not to die" - Dave

Potentially featuring:
- UFOs
- Space
- Dinosaurs
- Pizza

Original music and sounds by Wizard Oz

Contact for ideas, issues, or anything else you like, I'd be happy to hear from you!
